original: @250a sbyin sreg gi dus su bstod pa ni //
analyzed: @250a sbyin sreg gi dus su bstod pa ni //
translated: At the time of the fire sacrifice, the praise is:

original: h'um gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar //
analyzed: h'um gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar //
translated: Hūṃ. Greatly fierce, blazing like the fire at the end of time,
With the light of a hundred thousand suns,

original: gdug pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams //
analyzed: gdug pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams //

original: bdud dgra khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: bdud dgra khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, enemy of demons.

original: bgegs 'gugs pa ni //🔽h'um dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
analyzed: bgegs 'gugs pa ni // h'um dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//

original: thams cad 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: thams cad 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid //
translated: Hūṃ. The essence of the gathering of all buddhas of the three times,

original: ta kri ta bya ba'i khro rgyal gyis //
analyzed: ta kri ta bya ba'i khro rgyal gyis //
translated: The wrathful king who performs the activity of takṛt,🔽Summon the one to be summoned here today.

original: deng gi dgug bya 'dir khug cig / nam mkha' stong pa 'gugs byed na //
analyzed: deng gi dgug bya 'dir khug cig / nam mkha' stong pa 'gugs byed na //
translated: If empty space can be summoned,

original: gzugs dang ldan pa smos ci dgos //
analyzed: gzugs dang ldan pa smos ci dgos //
translated: What need is there to mention those endowed with form?

original: sems med ri bo'ang 'gugs byed na //
analyzed: sems med ri bo'ang 'gugs byed na //
translated: If even a mindless mountain can be summoned,

original: sems dang ldan pa smos ci dgos //
analyzed: sems dang ldan pa smos ci dgos //
translated: What need is there to mention those endowed with mind?

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' dang ni//
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' dang ni//
translated: By the command of the vajra holder

original: @250b rang bzhin dag pa'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: @250b rang bzhin dag pa'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: And the application of natural purity,

original: bar du gcod pa'i bgegs chen rnams //
analyzed: bar du gcod pa'i bgegs chen rnams //
translated: The great obstructors who create obstacles

original: ched dang don du 'dir khug cig / rnam thos sras klu brgya dang bcas pa bgugs na //🔽aom bee shra ba n'a ya a'a k'arsha ya h'um dza:/
analyzed: ched dang don du 'dir khug cig / rnam thos sras klu brgya dang bcas pa bgugs na // aom bee shra ba n'a ya a'a k'arsha ya h'um dza:/
translated: If one summons Vaiśravaṇa together with a hundred nāgas,🔽Om Vaiśravaṇa, summon! Hūṃ jaḥ!

original: aom n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni a'a k'a rsha ya h'um dza: zhes pa'o//
analyzed: aom n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni a'a k'a rsha ya h'um dza: zhes pa'o//
translated: Om Nīlāmbara-dhara Vajrapāṇi, summon! Hūṃ jaḥ!
